contents.translated: At which hour burmy evolved,  its cloak did doth becometh a part of this pokémon’s corse. The cloak is nev'r did shed. Its compliment extern changes depending on whither 't evolved. The materials on handeth becometh a part of its corse. At which hour evolving,  its corse doth take in surrounding materials. As a result,  thither art many corse variations.'t is did doth sayeth yond a wormadam yond evolves on a bitter cold day wilt hath't a thicker cloak. Its compliment extern changes depending on whither 't evolved. The materials on handeth becometh a part of its corse. At which hour burmy evolved,  its cloak did doth becometh a part of this pokémon’s corse. The cloak is nev'r did shed.
contents.text:
When BURMY evolved, its cloak
became a part of this Pokémon’s
body. The cloak is never shed.Its appearance changes depending
on where it evolved. The materials
on hand become a part of its body.When evolving, its body takes in
surrounding materials. As a result,
there are many body variations.It is said that a WORMADAM that
evolves on a cold day will have a
thicker cloak.Its appearance changes depending on where it
evolved. The materials on hand become a part of
its body.When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of
this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
